sentences: The conclusions contain, in an annex, a bracketed draft COP decision for consideration at SBSTA 31. ENVIRONMENTAL NGOs and INDIGENOUS PEOPLES ORGANIZATIONS underscored that forests are worth more than carbon, and highlighted the need to respect the UN Declaration on the Rights of Indigenous Peoples. PROTOCOL ARTICLE 2.3 (ADVERSE EFFECTS OF POLICIES AND MEASURES): The SBSTA adopted conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2009/L.10 and Add.1).
Contact group Co-Chair Tilley noted, and SBSTA Chair Plume agreed, that this was the most progress made on this issue in a long time.
